translation.en: Whoo. All right, guys, the Garvey Games announcements are about to come out.
translation.es: Chicos, ya van a salir los anuncios de los Juegos Garvey.

translation.en: Ooh! I haven't been this nervous
translation.es: La última vez que estuve tan nerviosa

translation.en: since I made eye contact with Kirstie Alley
translation.es: La última vez que estuve tan nerviosa fue cuando vi a los ojos a Kirstie Alley en un avión.

translation.en: on that Southwest flight.
translation.es: fue cuando vi a los ojos a Kirstie Alley en un avión.

translation.en: I love the Garvey Games, but I love their buffet even more.
translation.es: Me gustan los Juegos Garvey, pero me gusta más su bufé.

translation.en: At a buffet, everybody wins.
Well, except for the last guy.
The last guy does not win.
The Garvey Games are my least favorite time of year.
translation.es: Los Juegos Garvey son lo que menos me gusta del año.

translation.en: I prefer a competition of the mind, not the body.
translation.es: Prefiero una competencia de la mente, no del cuerpo.

translation.en: I bet you're gonna have a lot of dream catchers when you grow up.
translation.es: Apuesto a que tendrás muchos atrapasueños cuando crezcas.

translation.en: I didn't move here to lose. So...
translation.es: No me mudé aquí para perder.

translation.en: -who's our real competition? -Ugh. The Ericksons.
Karine, her husband, Kory, and their boys, Keegan, Kellen, and Kendall.
translation.es: Karine, su esposo, Kory, y sus hijos, Keegan, Kellen y Kendall.

translation.en: All spelled with Ks because they are...
what's the word? Monsters.
Oh! I know Keegan. We both play forward on the hockey team,
translation.es: Conozco a Keegan. Jugamos en el equipo de hockey

translation.en: and we're constantly competing for ice time.
He's a real butthead.
Yeah. The Ericksons have won the Garvey Games the last seven years in a row.
translation.es: Los Erickson han ganado los últimos siete años.

translation.en: But not this year.
Ooh! I cannot wait to see Karine cry tears of defeat, and I will use those tears
translation.es: Ya quiero ver a Karine derramando lágrimas de derrota que usaré

translation.en: to salt the glass of my victory margarita, which I will drink out of her skull.
translation.es: para escarchar el vaso de mi margarita de victoria, que beberé de su cráneo.

translation.en: Wait, Mom, isn't Karine one of your oldest friends?
translation.es: ¿Karine no es una de tus mejores amigas?

translation.en: Oh, my God, yes. I love her. She's my doubles partner.
translation.es: Sí. La amo. Es mi pareja de dobles.

translation.en: No, you do not want to peel that onion.
translation.es: No, no te conviene meterte en eso.

translation.en: The country assignments are in. Please, let us get USA.
translation.es: Ya asignaron los países. Por favor, que nos toque EE. UU.

translation.en: [all chanting] USA! USA!
Or Japan. Or any G7 country.
translation.es: O Japón o cualquier país del G7.

translation.en: [all chanting] Any G7! Any G7!
And we got...
the Federated States of Micronesia?
-What? -Seriously?
-Come on! -Such a beautiful chain of islands!
Okay, okay. You know what?
We can work with this. We can make this work.
Okay, now event assignments for the first round.
Lola, Pop-A-Shot.
Swish-swish, baby.
JJ, you're on Hula-Hoop.
I have hoop-bearing hips.
translation.es: Mis caderas son para el hula-hula.

translation.en: Show, you got shot put.
Oh, yeah, that's way more on-brand for me. Last year, I had limbo.
translation.es: Sí, eso es perfecto para mí. El año pasado me tocó el limbo.

translation.en: I still feel bad I turned that stick to sawdust.
translation.es: Aún me siento mal por convertir ese palo en aserrín.

translation.en: And I will do the sumo event.
translation.es: Y a mí me toca sumo.

translation.en: Ha! We are taking down the Ericksons this year.
translation.es: Les ganaremos a los Erickson este año.

translation.en: Hello. Aloha.
Don't forget about ol' Mandy.
Oh, no, honey. We didn't forget about you.
We reassigned you to the most important position of all.
translation.es: Te asignamos el puesto más importante de todos.

translation.en: [gasps] Chairman of the Fed? Team manager.
translation.es: - ¿Presidente de la Reserva Federal? - Jefa de equipo.

translation.en: We don't want you to run. Remember what happened last year?
translation.es: No queremos que corras. ¿Recuerdas el año pasado?

translation.en: I do hate running. It's the yelling of exercise.
translation.es: Odio correr. Las carreras son los gritos del ejercicio.

translation.en: Okay everyone, on three. One, two, three.
translation.es: A la cuenta de tres. Uno, dos, tres.

translation.en: [all] The Federated States of Micronesia!
Oof. That does not roll off the tongue.
-Let's try the initials. -Okay.
-TFSOM! -TFSOM!
-Yeah! -TFSOM!
...SOM!
Nope. That's much worse.
[sighing] I am so tired.
Did Mom really have to wake us up like that?
What time is it?
It's tomorrow in Micronesia, so we're already behind!
translation.es: Ya es mañana en Micronesia, ¡ya estamos atrasados!

translation.en: No one should have to get up at 4:00 a.m. unless there's a royal wedding.
translation.es: Nadie debería levantarse a las 4:00 a. m. a menos que haya una boda real.

translation.en: Hey, so are you sure you're cool with being the manager?
translation.es: ¿Segura que estás a gusto siendo la jefa del equipo?

translation.en: I mean, you're not really into sports, right?
No. The only sports movie I like is Moneyball
translation.es: No. Disfruto la película deportiva El juego de la fortuna

translation.en: because the hero is math.
translation.es: porque el héroe son las matemáticas.

translation.en: Plus, I know Mom wants to beat Karine.
translation.es: Y sé que mamá quiere vencer a Karine.

translation.en: I'm so confused. What's going on with that friendship?
translation.es: Estoy muy confundida. ¿Cómo es esa amistad?

translation.en: Okay, let me break it down.
They've been friends forever.
translation.es: Son amigas de toda la vida.

translation.en: They're super competitive, and they say they like each other,
translation.es: Son muy competitivas y dicen que se caen bien,

translation.en: but their words never really match their faces.
translation.es: pero sus palabras nunca coinciden con sus caras.

translation.en: Love your top, Cassy.
I think I wore it last season.
Oh, but luckily, we live in Florida, where there are no seasons.
translation.es: Por suerte, vivimos en Florida, donde no hay estaciones.

translation.en: Oh, there are at my cabin in the mountains.
translation.es: En mi cabaña en las montañas sí hay.

translation.en: Did I not tell you?
We bought a really expensive cabin in the mountains, in cash.
translation.es: Compramos una cabaña muy cara en las montañas, en efectivo.

translation.en: Oh, you paid in cash,
like the Russian mob or a drug dealer.
translation.es: como la mafia rusa o un narcotraficante.

translation.en: -So risky. -[laughs]
She smiles while she says mean things,
just like a British person.
Do you want the over or the under in the wheelbarrow race? Got it.
translation.es: ¿Quieres al conductor o a la carretilla en la carrera de carretillas? Listo.

translation.en: Are you gambling on the Garvey Games?
It's not gambling if you win.
JJ, you know gambling is illegal.
translation.es: JJ, sabes que apostar es ilegal.

translation.en: Relax. I don't deal in cash.
It's strictly a candy operation.
translation.es: Es estrictamente una operación de dulces.

translation.en: I got a guy on the inside in Vegas.
translation.es: Conozco a un tipo en Las Vegas.

translation.en: He works the high-roller counter at M&M World.
translation.es: Trabaja en el mostrador de M&M World.

translation.en: They have chocolate chip, blueberry, and churro.
translation.es: Tienen de chispas de chocolate, arándanos y churro.

translation.en: I got one of each 'cause they're free.
translation.es: Tomé uno de cada uno porque son gratis.

translation.en: No. You can't eat that.
You're competing. You're important.
Here you go, Mandy.
Yay. Manager pancakes.
Okay, Lola, listen up.
There are only three families we need to worry about.
translation.es: Solo debemos preocuparnos por tres familias.

translation.en: The rest are amateurs.
The Ortegas,
great climbers, both rock and social.
translation.es: grandes escaladores, de rocas y sociales.

translation.en: -Got it. -The Roberts.
Canadian, but don't kid yourself,
they will step on your neck, and they won't say sorry.
translation.es: te pisarán el cuello y no te pedirán perdón.

translation.en: But the real competition,
the thorn in our side, the cavity in our mouths,
translation.es: la roca en los zapatos, la caries en los dientes,

translation.en: -the wedgie in our undies-- -Cassy--
I'm talking about them.
Every year, the Ericksons get Team USA, and we get some terrible country.
translation.es: Cada año, los Erickson son Estados Unidos, y nosotros un país terrible.

translation.en: I think they're bribing the school.
translation.es: Creo que sobornan a la escuela.

translation.en: In their defense, they did hire Usher's cousin to write the new school anthem.
translation.es: Contrataron al primo de Usher para el nuevo himno escolar.

translation.en: It's a real bop.
Happy Garvey Games, guys.
Oh, my gosh. I love the Micronesian shirts.
translation.es: Dios mío. Me encantan las camisas micronesias.

translation.en: They're so wonderfully basic and thrown together.
translation.es: Se ven tan básicas y hechas deprisa.

translation.en: We were inspired by your makeup.
Well, good luck this year.
-Oh, my gosh. Good luck to you. -Oh! Give me a hug.
translation.es: - Dios mío. Buena suerte a ustedes. - Dame un abrazo.

translation.en: Oh, these feel so flammable.
-Good luck. -Yeah.
Oh, the National Resources Defense Council.
translation.es: El Consejo de Defensa de Recursos Nacionales.

translation.en: I love that organization.
Their e-mail blasts are poetry.
Totally. I mean, we only have one...
translation.es: Totalmente. - Solo tenemos una Tierra. - Tierra.

translation.en: [both] Earth.
Exactly.
Hi. I'm Summer.
I like the way you think. Are you an NPFM?
translation.es: Me gusta cómo piensas. ¿Eres un MFNP?

translation.en: Uh, what's an NPFM?
Non-participant family member.
We're the family members who don't participate in this trivial display of chest-bumping hubris.
translation.es: Somos los familiares que no participamos en esta exhibición trivial de humos.

translation.en: OMG!
Hubris is my favorite H-word.
translation.es: Humos es mi palabra favorita con H.

translation.en: Mine's "helioseismology."
You know, you should come hang out with me and the NPFMs in room 2B.
translation.es: Deberías ir conmigo y los demás MFNP al salón 2B.

translation.en: Oh, thank you, but I'm just here to support my family today.
translation.es: Gracias, pero vine a apoyar a mi familia.

translation.en: Okay. Well, it's up to you.
Favorite U-word, go!
[both] Ungulate.
Ung-you-later.
Welcome to the 17th Annual Garvey Games!
translation.es: ¡Bienvenidos a la versión 17.ª de los Juegos Anuales Garvey!

translation.en: -[clapping] -There's nothing I'd like to do more
translation.es: No hay nada que me guste más

translation.en: on my summer vacation than come to work.
translation.es: que venir a trabajar en mis vacaciones.

translation.en: Yeah, and this year, we've added a sick new event:
translation.es: Sí, y este año agregamos un evento nuevo increíble:

translation.en: Hands on a WaveRunner.
Yeah. It's like Hands on a Hard Body,
translation.es: Sí. Es como Manos al auto,

translation.en: except you put your hands on a brand-new WaveRunner.
translation.es: excepto que pones las manos en una moto acuática nueva.

translation.en: The winner gets the WaveRunner,
translation.es: El ganador se queda con la moto,

translation.en: in case that wasn't obvious.
I've never wanted anything more in my entire life.
translation.es: Nunca en mi vida había deseado tanto algo.

translation.en: To kick off the games, let's welcome our mascot,
translation.es: Para comenzar, démosle la bienvenida a nuestra mascota,

translation.en: Manny the Manatee,
and our student band, the Bandatees!
translation.es: y a nuestra banda estudiantil, los Bandatís.

translation.en: Oh, oh, oh! And here comes little Desmond with the Garvey Games torch.
translation.es: Y aquí viene el pequeño Desmond con la antorcha de los Juegos.

translation.en: Yes. I had three to one on that kid dropping the torch.
translation.es: Sí. Aposté tres a uno a que ese niño tiraba la antorcha.

translation.en: Knew he was a butterfinger. Now, ironically, you owe me a Snickers.
translation.es: Sabía que tenía manos de mantequilla. Ahora, irónicamente, me debes un Snickers.

translation.en: JJ, I'm gonna play you something I listen to to hype myself up.
translation.es: JJ, te voy a poner una canción que escucho para alentarme.

translation.en: It's me... talking to me.
[Lola on phone] Lola, you're faster than lightning.
translation.es: Lola, eres más rápida que un rayo.

translation.en: Lola, you're nimble as a puma.
translation.es: Lola, eres ágil como un puma.

translation.en: Lola, you're as strong as the bond
translation.es: Lola, eres tan fuerte como el vínculo

translation.en: between Selena Gomez and Justin Bieber.
translation.es: entre Selena Gómez y Justin Bieber.

translation.en: I recorded this a while ago.
Hey, Micros.
I hope JJ's ready for the Hula-Hoop competition.
translation.es: Espero que JJ esté lista para la competencia de hula-hula.

translation.en: Kendall's Hula-Hoop trainer said that he has Shakira hips,
translation.es: El entrenador de Kendall dijo que tiene caderas de Shakira,

translation.en: and he don't lie.
Mmm. That's sweet. Yeah, JJ doesn't need training.
translation.es: Qué tierno. JJ no necesita entrenamiento.

translation.en: As a baby, she sat, crawled, Hula-Hooped, then walked.
translation.es: Cuando era bebé, se sentó, gateó, aprendió el hula-hula y luego caminó.

translation.en: I love Hula-Hoop. I love an ice-cream scoop.
translation.es: El hula-hula me encanta. También un helado en la garganta.

translation.en: I love anything that rhymes with "poop."
She's a genius.
All right, participants,
grab your Hula-Hoops.
And on my whistle, start hooping.
-Okay, let's go. -[whistle blows]
-Go, go, go! Yes, JJ! -Come on!
-No, move your hips! -Move!
-Come on! -Move your hips!
What? Wait. JJ, what happened?
I bet against myself.
By losing, I'm actually winning.
Wicked smart, right?
Jennifer Jane, you cannot gamble.
You especially can't bet on the sport you're playing in.
translation.es: Sobre todo, no puedes apostar en el deporte que juegas.

translation.en: Oh, that makes a lot of sense. They should make that a rule.
translation.es: Tiene mucho sentido. Debería ser una regla.

translation.en: It's literally the number one rule.
Okay, no bathroom breaks.
translation.es: No hay descansos para ir al baño.

translation.en: No food breaks.
No cutting the brakes on teachers' cars.
translation.es: Ni cortar los frenos de los autos de los maestros.

translation.en: Fool me twice, James.
-May the best hand win. -[whistle blows]
Hope you're ready to accept defeat.
translation.es: Espero que estés listo para aceptar la derrota.

translation.en: Please. I've wanted one of these water motorcycles for a long time.
translation.es: Por favor. Hace mucho que quiero una de estas motos acuáticas.

translation.en: No regular-sized man's gonna stop me.
translation.es: Ningún hombre de talla normal me detendrá.

translation.en: Oh, is that a water bottle from the musical Wicked?
translation.es: ¿Es una botella de agua del musical Wicked?

translation.en: Yeah. You got a problem with that?
Uh, yeah, considering you probably don't even appreciate
translation.es: Sí, porque probablemente ni siquiera aprecias

translation.en: what a soaring theatrical accomplishment it is.
translation.es: el gran logro teatral que es.

translation.en: Please.
I've seen it 14 times and once in Japanese.
translation.es: Lo he visto 14 veces y una vez en japonés.

translation.en: Well, I've seen it with Idina Menzel.
translation.es: Yo lo vi con Idina Menzel.

translation.en: What? You've seen it with the OBC?
The original Broadway cast?
Orchestra center, son.
You know, Garvey Prep should do that as their next musical.
translation.es: Ese debería ser el próximo musical de Garvey.

translation.en: Oh, your Mandy would be a terrific Elphaba.
She's got the pipes.
Thank you. And your son Kellen would be a great stage manager.
translation.es: Gracias. Y tu hijo Kellen sería un gran director de escena.

translation.en: Anything with a clipboard is where he shines.
Well, he's out. Apparently, no WaveRunner
translation.es: Él está fuera. Ninguna moto acuática

translation.en: is worth listening to two supersized drama dorks.
translation.es: vale la pena escuchar a los ñoños de teatro.

translation.en: Mandy. Glad you're here.
Let me give you a tour.
Okay.
So that's our meditation corner.
translation.es: Ese es nuestro rincón de meditación.

translation.en: Those are feminist crochet beanbags.
translation.es: Esos son cojines feministas de croché.

translation.en: And, ooh, would you like some of our vegan charcuterie?
translation.es: ¿Quieres un poco de nuestra charcutería vegana?

translation.en: Oh, my God.
Did I just die and wake up in a TED Talk?
translation.es: ¿Me morí y desperté en una charla TED?

translation.en: Welcome home, sister.
Thank you. I am never leaving.
Shoot. We're already down four medals to the Ericksons.
translation.es: Rayos. Los Erickson nos van ganando por cuatro medallas.

translation.en: It's okay. I'm about to school the USA in Pop-A-Shot.
translation.es: Está bien. Estoy a punto de darle clases de básquet a Estados Unidos.

translation.en: They call me the LeBron James of Micronesia.
translation.es: Me llaman la LeBron James de Micronesia.

translation.en: Hey, Keegan.
I'm in your head now.
[coughing] Oh, my God.
That was a lot of chalk.
[Cassy] Okay, come on, Lola! Go, go, go, go!
Yes! Oh, my gosh, you're killing it!
Get it, girl!
-Yes! Lola! Whoo! -[whistle blows]
-[Miss Riggi] Micronesia! -Yes!
-Yes! -[yelling excitedly]
Yes!
Whoo! Yes!
-And the winner is... -Yes, yes?
-Yeah! -Yeah! Whoo!
-Yes! -Yes!
Jeez!
Yes!
What JJ doesn't realize is
I've been watering down her Capri Suns the whole time.
translation.es: es que he estado diluyendo sus jugos Capri Sun.

translation.en: No, no, no, we don't even allow those in our house.
I make my own drink. Half water, half lemon juice.
translation.es: Yo hago mi propio jugo. Mitad agua, mitad jugo de limón.

translation.en: Call it Erick-Suns. You know, like our last name.
translation.es: Los llamamos Erick-Suns. Como nuestro apellido.

translation.en: Oh, I get it, bro. And I love it.
All right, time check.
Three hours. What a waste.
Man, time really flies when you're connecting with someone.
translation.es: El tiempo vuela cuando te conectas con alguien.

translation.en: Truth, man, truth. [groans]
My shoulder won't stop acting up after fixing Kellen's bike.
translation.es: Me duele el hombro desde que arreglé la bici de Kellen.

translation.en: Hey, let me at that shoulder. I'll show you a trick I learned back in my WWE days.
translation.es: Déjame ver. Te enseñaré un truco que aprendí en la WWE.

translation.en: What are you-- Okay, man to man?
-Yeah. -This feels really good.
translation.es: - Sí. - Esto se siente muy bien.

translation.en: Ow! What? And that's to remind you to stay on your side.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? - Para que te quedes en tu lado.

translation.en: Good job, honey. [laughs]
Hey, guys, great news.
We're both in the finals. How fun is that?
translation.es: Ambos estamos en la final. Qué divertido, ¿no?

translation.en: Oh, the funnest fun.
Can I just say that I am so glad it's your family we're up against?
translation.es: Solo quiero decir que me alegra que nos enfrentemos a tu familia.

translation.en: Oh, so glad. I mean, like, so glad.
translation.es: A mí también. Me alegra muchísimo.

translation.en: I know. I'm, like, super-duper glad.
translation.es: Lo sé. Yo estoy extremadamente alegre.

translation.en: Wow. I'm gonna say something bold.
translation.es: Voy a decir algo muy fuerte.

translation.en: I think that was my favorite Terry Gross interview to date.
translation.es: Creo que esa ha sido mi entrevista favorita de Terry Gross.

translation.en: Absolutely. Co-sign.
Wow. [sniffs] It smells like a public library in here.
Welcome, JJ. Please remove your shoes.
translation.es: Bienvenida, JJ. Por favor, quítate los zapatos.

translation.en: Not happening, dawg. I just came to check on you.
translation.es: En tus sueños, amiga. Solo vine a ver cómo estabas.

translation.en: Aw. That's so sweet.
But I've never felt so connected to a group in my life.
translation.es: Pero nunca me había sentido tan conectada con un grupo en mi vida.

translation.en: These people are my people.
So, nerds?
Oh, which reminds me.
I need you to hold my stash of Nerds.
translation.es: Necesito que guardes mis dulces Nerds.

translation.en: Why are you giving this to me?
It's my emergency candy stash.
translation.es: Es mi reserva de emergencia de dulces.

translation.en: Don't give it to me.
Even if I beg, cry, or plead.
If I look like I'm dying,
and the only thing that'll save me is a Twix,
translation.es: y lo único que me salvará es un Twix,

translation.en: do not give it to me!
Jeez, I get it. So dramatic.
Cool.
Oh, hey, can you just toss me a Kit Kat for the road?
translation.es: Oye, ¿me das un Kit Kat para el camino?

translation.en: Sure.
What did I just say?
Hey, man, it's been really great getting to know you.
translation.es: Oye, amigo, ha sido genial conocerte.

translation.en: Sucks that we both can't have this WaveRunner.
translation.es: Qué mal que no podamos ganar los dos.

translation.en: I was thinking the same thing. It's like we have the same brain.
translation.es: Estaba pensando lo mismo. Es como si tuviéramos el mismo cerebro.

translation.en: Well, here's a thought that you probably are also thinking because we share a brain. Duh.
translation.es: Se me ocurre algo que probablemente a ti también porque compartimos cerebro.

translation.en: What if we take our hands off at the exact same time?
translation.es: ¿Y si quitamos las manos al mismo tiempo?

translation.en: And share custody of the WaveRunner?
Yes. I'll take it out Fourth of July, and you take it out Labor Day.
translation.es: Sí. Yo la tendré el 4 de julio y tú el Día del Trabajo.

translation.en: I love that.
Hey, would it be crazy if we just rode it one time together?
translation.es: Oye, ¿sería una locura si nos subiéramos los dos una vez?

translation.en: -Whoo! -Oh, this is awesome!
-This is super fun! -Whoo!
Now I only want to ride this together.
Let's take our hands off when I say go.
translation.es: Quitemos las manos cuando yo diga.

translation.en: Ready, set...
go.
Ladies and gentlemen, we finally have a winner.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, tenemos un ganador.

translation.en: Gabe Iglesias!
Oh, man!
Oh, this is awesome!
I've always wanted to win one of these.
translation.es: Siempre había querido ganar una de estas.

translation.en: Oh, man, never wanted to buy one,
but I did wanna win one.
[sighs] Let me tell you something. The real prize, the real prize,
translation.es: Déjame decirte algo. El verdadero premio

translation.en: was watching
this beautiful friendship unfold and blossom right in front of me.
translation.es: cómo se desarrolló esta bonita amistad frente a mí.

translation.en: Two grown, adult men.
You two. The real heroes.
Do you have any family at this school?
No. No.
Hey, listen, I'm a real big fan. You think you can, uh...
translation.es: Oye, soy un gran admirador. ¿Crees que puedas

translation.en: autograph it right there where your hand was, uh...
before you lost?
Anything for a fan.
translation.es: Lo que sea por un fan.

translation.en: Oh, man, this is sweet.
I am never washing this off.
The ocean might, but the memory will always be right here.
translation.es: Tal vez el océano lo haga, pero el recuerdo siempre estará aquí.

translation.en: Here we go. This is gonna be my new dating profile pic.
translation.es: Esta va a ser mi nueva foto de perfil de citas.

translation.en: -Take that, Marsha. -[camera clicks]
All right, we're down to only two families:
translation.es: Muy bien, solo quedan dos familias:

translation.en: the Wights and the Ericksons.
Now, here are your rules for the final relay race.
translation.es: Estas son las reglas para la carrera final.

translation.en: One, no open-toed shoes.
This isn't Bible times or a Phish concert.
translation.es: No son tiempos bíblicos ni un concierto de Phish.

translation.en: And two, all members of the family must pass the baton to each other.
translation.es: Y dos, todos los miembros de la familia deben pasarse el testigo.

translation.en: And by the way, instead of batons, we have eggs.
translation.es: Y por cierto, en lugar de testigos, tenemos huevos.

translation.en: Exciting stuff, fam.
Oh, Cassy, did you hear that?
All family members have to compete.
translation.es: Todos los miembros de la familia deben competir.

translation.en: Where's your other daughter?
Oh, no, all my daughters are here. Let's get started.
translation.es: No, todas mis hijas están aquí. Comencemos.

translation.en: I don't see the middle one.
translation.es: No veo a la de en medio.

translation.en: You know, the one with a thyroid problem.
translation.es: La que tiene el problema de tiroides.

translation.en: Mandy doesn't have a thyroid problem.
translation.es: Mandy no tiene un problema de tiroides.

translation.en: -I knew you had another daughter. -Dang it.
translation.es: - Sabía que tenías otra hija. - Maldita sea.

translation.en: Cassy, come on.
Look, I also want to win, but this is going too far.
translation.es: Mira, yo también quiero ganar, pero esto es demasiado.

translation.en: Okay, fine.
I'll go get Mandy. And her perfect thyroid!
translation.es: Iré por Mandy y su tiroides perfecta.

translation.en: [gasps] The 1911 Triangle Shirtwaist fire.
translation.es: El incendio de Triangle Shirtwaist de 1911.

translation.en: -Yes. -Yes!
Hey. Uh, let's go, honey. We need you to compete in the final relay.
translation.es: Hola. Vámonos, cariño. Necesitamos que compitas en los relevos.

translation.en: But we're playing Historical Tragedies Pictionary.
What? Oh, no.
You're gonna have to come back to sad Pictionary later. Come on.
translation.es: Luego regresas a jugar Pictionary triste. Vamos.

translation.en: But I don't wanna leave this place.
translation.es: Pero no quiero irme de aquí.

translation.en: This is my heaven.
Mom, I think I'm an indoor kid.
translation.es: Creo que disfruto más estar adentro.

translation.en: Oh, honey, of course you are.
When you were four, you said your sworn enemy was the beach.
translation.es: Cuando tenías cuatro años, dijiste que tu enemigo era la playa.

translation.en: Look, Mandy, I am sorry.
What happened this morning when I sidelined you, that was wrong.
translation.es: Lo que pasó esta mañana cuando te dejé de lado, estuvo mal.

translation.en: You know, if I participate, we're gonna lose,
and I'm probably gonna throw up. I've had so many pieces of cashew cheese,
translation.es: y probablemente vomitaré. He comido tanto queso de nuez

translation.en: my stomach is barking.
And, honey, if we lose, that's fine.
The family being together is what matters,
translation.es: La familia unida es lo que importa,

translation.en: and whatever happens,
we'll have a lot more fun with you by our side.
translation.es: nos divertiremos más contigo a nuestro lado.

translation.en: What do you say?
[sighs] Okay, Mom.
For you and only you, I'll do it.
translation.es: Por ti y solo por ti, lo haré.

translation.en: Okay. Come on.
Okay.
Goodbye, soul mates. I hope we meet again.
translation.es: Adiós, almas gemelas. Espero que nos volvamos a ver.

translation.en: And, Summer, I'll see you in the comments section of the New Yorker online.
translation.es: Y, Summer, te veo en los comentarios del New Yorker en línea.

translation.en: [loudly] All right, everyone.
I don't need this. My voice is a natural megaphone.
translation.es: No necesito esto. Mi voz es un megáfono natural.

translation.en: If you break your egg,
you'll be disqualified,
and you'll be charged for the egg.
translation.es: y tendrán que pagar el huevo.

translation.en: Eggs don't grow on trees, people. That's just science.
translation.es: Los huevos no crecen en los árboles. Eso es ciencia.

translation.en: We are so close to being champs, y'all. I can feel it.
translation.es: Estamos muy cerca de ser campeones. Puedo sentirlo. Esta es la alineación.

translation.en: Okay, okay, here is the lineup.
translation.es: Puedo sentirlo. Esta es la alineación.

translation.en: I will go first on dizzy bat.
translation.es: Yo empezaré en el bate mareado. Show, JJ, carrera de slinky.

translation.en: Show, JJ, Slinky race. Lola, tunnel crawl,
translation.es: Yo empezaré en el bate mareado. Show, JJ, carrera de slinky. Lola, el túnel,

translation.en: and Mandy, you are last on tricycle.
translation.es: y Mandy, tú cierras en el triciclo.

translation.en: Wait, wait, you're putting me last?
translation.es: Espera, ¿yo voy a ser la última?

translation.en: That's way too much pressure.
Mandy, you'll be a great anchor.
But an anchor's the thing that literally stops the ship.
translation.es: Pero el ancla es lo que literalmente detiene el barco.

translation.en: Okay. [clears throat]
Oh, hey, Karine, try not to use this in your signature egg salad.
translation.es: Oye, Karine, trata de no usar esto en tu famosa ensalada de huevo.

translation.en: You know, the one that gave everyone gas at the school picnic.
translation.es: La que les dio gases a todos en el pícnic escolar.

translation.en: At least I made something.
You just brought KFC.
Mmm. And it went so fast.
On your mark, get set, go! -Oh! -[whistle blows]
Come on! Go!
-Okay, come on, Mandy, start pedaling. -Go, go!
I... I can't do this. Just disown me, so I won't be a part of the family,
translation.es: No puedo hacerlo. Desconóceme, para que no sea de la familia y puedan ganar sin mí.

translation.en: and you can win without me.
translation.es: Desconóceme, para que no sea de la familia y puedan ganar sin mí.

translation.en: Mom, I'm not a cat.
Snap out of it. You are a part of this family.
translation.es: Reacciona. Eres parte de esta familia.

translation.en: And not only are you going to participate, you are going to win!
translation.es: Y no solo vas a participar, ¡vas a ganar!

translation.en: Come on! Go!
-Yes! Go, go, go, go! -That's it!
-Mandy, go, go, go, go, go! -Yes!
-Yes! -[Big Show] You can do it! Come on, Mandy!
[Cassy] Go, go, go, go!
Oh, my gosh!
Yeah!
Oh! Yes! She did it!
Yeah!
[crowd chanting] Mandy! Mandy! Mandy!
Mandy! Mandy!
Mandy! Mandy!
-Mandy! -No! No! Whoa, whoa, whoa.
No, there is no way they won.
translation.es: No puede ser que hayan ganado.

translation.en: No way. I challenge.
translation.es: No puede ser. - Los reto. - No, ganamos justamente.

translation.en: No, no, we won fair and square.
No, there's no way that your weak indoor child beat my Kellen.
translation.es: No, no es posible que tu débil niña venza a mi Kellen.

translation.en: What did you say about my daughter?
I said that she is weak and lame,
translation.es: Dije que es débil y patética,

translation.en: like the rest of your dumb family.
translation.es: como el resto de tu estúpida familia.

translation.en: Oh, Mandy! Oh, honey, are you-- [gags]
Mandy. Mandy.
You know it's bad when Mom puts herself in a time-out.
translation.es: Sabes que es malo cuando mamá se autocastiga.

translation.en: She did get us disqualified for unsportsmanlike conduct.
translation.es: Hizo que nos descalificaran por conducta antideportiva.

translation.en: Yeah, the screaming, the rage,
the way she tore that trophy apart with her bare hands.
translation.es: y cómo destrozó ese trofeo con sus propias manos.

translation.en: I fell in love all over again. [chuckles]
Look at my haul.
It's another great day to be JJ.
translation.es: Es otro gran día para ser JJ.

translation.en: How much did you gamble?
A lot.
I thought candy was addicting,
translation.es: Pensé que los dulces eran adictivos,

translation.en: but gambling is very addicting.
They should warn people about that.
Wow. That is a lot of candy.
I bet everything on you.
You're my sister. I believed in you.
translation.es: Eres mi hermana. Creí en ti.

translation.en: Oh, JJ, that's so sweet.
I also bet ten to one you'd blow chunks,
translation.es: También aposté diez a uno a que vomitarías,

translation.en: so I cleaned house, baby.
Cassy, I think you've been in time-out long enough.
translation.es: Cassy, creo que llevas mucho tiempo castigada.

translation.en: No, I haven't been punished enough.
Maybe you should roll up the newspaper and hit me on the nose a couple times.
translation.es: Deberías enrollar un periódico y golpearme la nariz un par de veces.

translation.en: Okay, first of all, you're not a dog,
translation.es: Bueno, primero, no eres un perro,

translation.en: and second, what's a newspaper?
I just... I cannot believe I acted like that.
translation.es: Es que no puedo creer que haya hecho eso.

translation.en: Karine is supposed to be my friend.
translation.es: Se supone que Karine es mi amiga.

translation.en: Cassy, let me tell you a story.
[laughs] So, you're telling me stories now?
Yes.
Back in Minnesota, I had this friend who was also named Lola.
translation.es: En Minnesota, tenía una amiga que también se llamaba Lola.

translation.en: We hated each other,
but we pretended to be friends because we both had the same name.
translation.es: pero fingíamos ser amigas porque éramos tocayas.

translation.en: Well, that's dumb.
Exactly.
Things got really messy between Lola Two and me.
translation.es: Todo se complicó entre Lola dos y yo.

translation.en: Oh, so you were Lola Number One?
No. I was just Lola. Why does everyone always ask that?
translation.es: No. Yo era Lola a secas. ¿Por qué todos preguntan eso?

translation.en: The point is, one day, I sent her a radically honest text
translation.es: El punto es que un día le envié un mensaje radicalmente sincero

translation.en: saying I didn't want to be friends anymore.
translation.es: de que ya no quería ser su amiga.

translation.en: Oh, you can just do that? That's an option?
Yes.
And the second I hit send, I felt a weight had been lifted.
translation.es: Y en cuanto lo envié, sentí que me quité un peso de encima.

translation.en: You should do that with Karine.
No, you're... you're right. But how?
I think I figured out a way to fix it.
translation.es: Creo que encontré la forma de arreglarlo.

translation.en: Did you Postmates wine? Good call.
-Hey. -[gasps]
Nobody's here! Go away!
You have breached the alarm system. You will be arrested.
translation.es: Activaste el sistema de alarma. Serás arrestada.

translation.en: Cops.
Two words: radical honesty.
Karine, Kory, how are you?
Okay, you know what? Forget it.
I am too tired from today to do this.
translation.es: Estoy muy cansada para hacer esto.

translation.en: Karine, can I talk to you?
Okay.
[excitedly] Oh, hey, Karine. Is Kory here?
I mean, whatever. I mean, if he's here, I'll go say hi.
translation.es: Digo, me da igual. Si está aquí, lo voy a saludar.

translation.en: You know, if you hear any laughing or...
harmonizing, you know, just being polite.
translation.es: armonía es solo que estoy siendo amable.

translation.en: Whatever.
Okay, uh...
Let me start by saying
I am so sorry I threw an egg at your back.
translation.es: que lamento haberte lanzado un huevo.

translation.en: That was so childish of me, and I knew it was wrong
translation.es: Eso fue muy infantil de mi parte, y sabía que estaba mal porque se sintió muy bien.

translation.en: because it felt so good.
translation.es: y sabía que estaba mal porque se sintió muy bien.

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. Thank you, but I think that I was at fault.
translation.es: No, gracias, pero creo que fue mi culpa.

translation.en: And I don't know what this thing is that we do, but it's exhausting.
translation.es: Y no sé bien qué es esto que hacemos, pero es agotador.

translation.en: Okay, I'm gonna try something.
It's called radical honesty.
Here goes.
I don't want to be friends with you anymore.
translation.es: Ya no quiero ser tu amiga.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
I feel the exact same way.
Oh! [laughs] This is, like, the first thing we've ever agreed on.
translation.es: Es la primera vez que estamos de acuerdo.

translation.en: -This is amazing. I feel so alive. -[laughing]
translation.es: Esto es increíble. Me siento muy viva.

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. So, what do we do next?
Well, pfft, I'll tell you what we don't have to do.
translation.es: Te diré qué no tenemos que hacer. Ir por café,

translation.en: -Coffee, yogalates, bag parties, -Ugh. Yes.
translation.es: Te diré qué no tenemos que hacer. Ir por café, yogalates, fiestas de venta de bolsas, copresidir el baile escolar,

translation.en: co-chairing the school dance.
translation.es: yogalates, fiestas de venta de bolsas, copresidir el baile escolar,

translation.en: -Never. -Winesday, Thurswine.
-Brunch... -Yes.
-...uh, football Sunday... -Yeah. -...annual Cabo trip... -Oh, God.
translation.es: ...domingo de fútbol, el viaje anual a Cabo

translation.en: ...and Christmas dinner.
Wait,
so can we not be friends on social media?
translation.es: ¿podemos dejar de ser amigas en redes sociales?

translation.en: -Yes. -[laughs]
A thousand times, yes.
Okay. Okay. Grab your phones.
We are going to consciously unfriend each other right now.
translation.es: Vamos a dejar de ser amigas deliberadamente.

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay. Facebook first. On three.
translation.es: - Sí. - Primero Facebook. A las tres.

translation.en: One, two, three.
[laughs] Okay, now, Instagram.
-Done. -One, two, three.
Everyone, Karine and I have an announcement to make.
translation.es: Oigan, Karine y yo tenemos que dar un anuncio.

translation.en: We are no longer friends.
Wait, wait, wait. What does that-- Wait. What?
This is good. Yeah, it's good.
translation.es: Esto es bueno. Sí, está bien.

translation.en: -Thank you, and I look forward... -Thank you.
translation.es: Gracias, y espero verte para ignorarte en los pasillos de la escuela.

translation.en: ...to ignoring you in the hallways at school.
translation.es: y espero verte para ignorarte en los pasillos de la escuela.

translation.en: -See you not later. -Hmm. See you not later.
translation.es: - No nos vemos luego. - No nos vemos luego.

translation.en: Done. Done. Done. Done.
Let's go home, Kory. I'm done.
translation.es: Vamos a casa, Kory. Ya terminé.

translation.en: Can we still be friends?
Nah, bro. Dolls before Guys and Dolls.
translation.es: No, hermano. Ellas antes que Ellos y ellas.

translation.en: Does this mean we're not seeing Guys and Dolls together?
translation.es: ¿O sea que no veremos Ellos y ellas?

translation.en: No, of course we're seeing G and D together.
translation.es: No, claro que la veremos juntos.

translation.en: Who's gonna get mad if we just happened to sit next to each other
translation.es: ¿Quién se va a enojar si nos sentamos juntos por casualidad

translation.en: wearing matching fedoras?
Probably the people behind you.
translation.es: Probablemente la gente detrás de ti.

translation.en: Cassy, we're proud of you.
Oh, and I'm proud of you.
translation.es: Y yo estoy orgullosa de ti.

translation.en: Guys, no matter what anyone says, we won the Garvey Games,
translation.es: Chicos, no importa lo que digan, nosotros ganamos los Juegos Garvey,

translation.en: and we did it by sticking together as a family.
translation.es: y lo hicimos uniéndonos como familia.

translation.en: Okay, everyone, Micronesia on three.
translation.es: Muy bien, Micronesia a las tres.

translation.en: One, two, three.
[all] The Federated States of Micronesia!
Nope, never gonna work.
We better get something good next year.
translation.es: Hay que conseguir algo bueno el próximo año.

translation.en: And the Garvey Games country for this year is...
translation.es: Y el país de este año para los Juegos Garvey es...

translation.en: the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg?
Come on!
